title: Black Friday T206 Sale (10% off VCP)

posts.post_title: Black Friday T206 Sale (10% off VCP)
posts.post_content:
All are graded SGC 40 (3).  I've taken 10% off VCP for each one.  No further discounts available.  Payment via PayPal gift or please add 3% for regular PayPal.  Thanks for looking!
